metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26874 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: lib/Horde/Mime/Viewer/Ooo.php in Horde Mime_Viewer before 2.2.4 allows XSS via an OpenOffice document, leading to account takeover in Horde Groupware Webmail Edition. This occurs after XSLT rendering.

criterions.comment: php-horde-mime-viewer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
